author: cutting
msg: Add instructions about where and when to file reports.

author: mfreedman
msg: PORTLETBRIDGE-232: Add ability for portlet to clear scopeId
PORTLETBRIDGE-231: Stuck threads possible when removing scopes.

author: shathaway
msg: XALANC-734 Allow runConfigure to inherit CFLAGS and CXXFLAGS from the environment

author: stefan2
msg: When the zero-copy code path has been activated, a blocked write may
eventually block any other client from being served by svnserve.
Therefore, set an 1 second timeout on the socket write stream.
(ZERO_COPY_TIMEOUT): introduce a define for the timeout
(get_timeout): new function to determine the right timeout setting
